STRAIT OF OTRANTO.
FIVE METER VESSEL, WHITE AND RED HULL,
15 PERSONS ON BOARD, IN NEED OF ASSISTANCE
IN 40-00N 019-00E. VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220, PHONE: 39 06 592 4145,
39 065 908 4697, 39 065 908 4409,
FAX: 39 06 592 2737, 39 065 908 4793,
